Helen Steven (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 19 Ọktoba 1942 n'ụbọchị 12 Eprel 2016) bụ onye Quaker na-eme udo na Scotland na otu n'ime ndị guzobere Scottish Center for Nonviolence E ji onyinye Gandhi International Peace Award kwado mmegide ya megide ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nuklia dị na Scotland n'afọ 2004.

Steven gụrụ akwụkwọ na Laurel Bank School na Mahadum Glasgow, ma rụọ ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye nkuzi akụkọ ihe mere eme. O wepụtara onwe ya na Peace Corps na Vietnam na mbido afọ 1970, ma chọta mkpebi ya na pacifism na ahụmịhe ya na Vietnam.

Ya na onye mmekọ ya Ellen Moxley, o guzobere Peace House dị nso na Dunblane n'afọ 1985, na-enye ọzụzụ na udo, ikpe ziri ezi na ime ihe ike na-abụghị ime ihe ike. Ihe karịrị puku mmadụ iri gara ọmụmụ ihe ahụ n'ime afọ iri na abụọ. N'oge ahụ, Steven na Moxley họọrọ ibi n'okpuru ọnụego ụtụ isi, yabụ na ha agaghị enye aka n'inye ego maka ngwá agha nuklia nke Britain. Steven mechara nyere aka guzobe Scottish Centre for Nonviolence n'afọ 1999. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechiri n'afọ 2007, mana n'oge ahụ Steven nwere ike ịmepụta usoro na-abụghị ime ihe ike maka nzere masta nke Mahadum Open kwadoro.
